inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of PSP with bilateral symptoms based on medical history and neurologic examination in accordance with NINDS criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Men or nonpregnant women age 35 to 75 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Before any study-specific procedures are performed, the subject and their designated representative must give signed informed consent for their participation.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with levodopa, dopamine agonists or any other antiparkinsonian medications.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of clinically significant psychosis or hallucinations.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
